ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Very good idea. I think with Lost Dungeons of Norrath they are doing something so that you can add enhancements to your items and that s the closest I can
ygData.messageBody:
> I think that craft items should be more beneficial and thus more
> valuable. At present, there is little motivation to craft unless you
> have a gaming predilection to do things like that. At present, by the
> time you have leveled up enough to aquire materials, plus leveled your
> crafting, the items you make aren't as good as what you can hunt or buy.
>
Very good idea. I think with Lost Dungeons of Norrath they are doing
something so that you can add enhancements to your items and that's the
closest I can see to what you're aiming at. I really do wish that more of
the stuff you make was useful. I think it's horrendous that you have to
spend so much money on acrylia and superb rockhopper hides to make something
that sells for maybe 3pp to other players. I also wish they would do
something so that they have more tailoring supplies available from
merchants. Heh, I have my tailoring at 167-- cost me over 900pp to get it
from 158 to 167... And I couldn't even sell the stuff back to the merchant
for even 1/3 of the cost.
>
> A real in-game economy would add to the fun. Especially if it would be
> good even for casual gamers. I can't always find the time to play
> enough to level and aquire stuff in ways which seem economical. There
> should be provision for a good gaming experience even for very casual
> gamers.
>
Good point. :-)
luv,
-Su
